title: Why do I join the lobby late ?
body:
I've been searching the internet for fixes for this issue and I don't seem to find any so I'll post it here.

For some reason, whenever I go join the lobby, I always join like 1 - 2 seconds late and only in the first few seconds, whenever I type something it takes awhile for the game to react, then it's normal after. Pretty much ruins my chance at getting the position I want.

I thought it was a connection issue, but it occurs when no one else is using the internet, and it occurs if I used my friends internet, and he joins the lobby instantly.

Game runs fine as long as there aren't other people streaming.

Is there any way to fix this ? Or at least find out why it's doing this ?

On a side note, I reposted this because I got the title pretty wrong. (I hope this isn't against the rules or anything)
